Package com.playground.playground.modelling

Class NeuralNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.playground.playground.modelling.NeuralNet
  • public class NeuralNet
extends java.lang.Object
    The NeuralNet class is responsible for creating the DAGs in memory and creating an overall model structure and initializing the model DAG and its weights making it ready for training. This class should not be used at all and only the associated builder class should be used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

      The NeuralNet class is responsible for creating the DAGs in memory and creating an overall model structure and initializing the model DAG and its weights making it ready for training.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuralNet

        public NeuralNet​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> layers,
                 int seed,
                 int inputs,
                 double learningRate,
                 org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.Updater optimizer,
                 org.deeplearning4j.nn.api.OptimizationAlgorithm optimizationAlgorithm,
                 org.nd4j.linalg.activations.Activation activation,
                 org.deeplearning4j.nn.weights.WeightInit weightInit,
                 int nOut,
                 org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.LossFunctions.LossFunction lossFunction,
                 boolean regularization,
                 java.lang.String regularizationType,
                 double regularizationFactor)
        The NeuralNet class is responsible for creating the DAGs in memory and creating an overall model structure and initializing the model DAG and its weights making it ready for training.
        Parameters:
        layers - List of layers excluding the output layer, defaults to [2, 4, 2].
        seed - Seed to use to train model, defaults to 123.
        inputs - Number of inputs to this model, defaults to 2.
        learningRate - The learning rate to use.
        optimizer - Optimizer to use, defaults to Adam.
        optimizationAlgorithm - Optimization Algorithm to use, defaults to SGD.
        activation - The activation to use, defaults to ReLU.
        weightInit - The weight initialization to use, defaults to Xavier.
        nOut - The number of outputs the model should return, defaults to 2.
        lossFunction - The loss function to use, defaults to negative log likelihood.
        regularization - Should you use regularization, defaults to true.
        regularizationType - The regularization to use, defaults to L2.
        regularizationFactor - The regularization factor to use.
